title: sadA bhAvayE shamita
sahitya:
(rAgA:  nATa)   
  sadA bhAvayE shamita mahAntam sadAshiva gurum aparimita vaibhavam


anupallavi

  udAra guNa shIlam yativaram samAna hInam sadgati darshakam
			(rAg  gauLa)


caraNam 1    karuNAnidham kAmita phaladam paramahamsa mahA prAjna varENYam
natajana sEvitam nanda pragATham parama pavitram pAvana caritram
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  Arabhi)Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  tAmasa guNa dOSadamita vibhAkaram dhAraNa asamvita Adhrta shrESTam
kAma krOdhAdi nAshita nipuNam kAraNa avatAram pAvana sundaram
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  varALi)Aa:S G1 R1 G1 M2 P D1 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D1 P M2 G1 R1 S  pUrti vidyApradam pUjyam hAtmanam kIrtishAliam kIrtanakArakam
Artibhanjanam advaita ranjanam pArthava samvitam satya samsucanam
    caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  shrI)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P D2 N2 P M1 R2 G2 R2 S  tyajita samsaraNam sadaya hrdAlayam samsiddha samvEdam sadguru krpAdhAram
samlagna parabrahma samlakSaNAnvitam sAyujyAdi mukti nimaghnam
